name: Lost House
description:
Escape From the Lost House

"Escape from the Lost House" Is a simple game of lost and found. You will need to escape the house by finding lost Items that a mysterious occult leader Is looking for. There are several creepy crawling things that will try to hinder you, but the only way Is to find the Lost Items, for a creepy Occult Leader that has kidnapped you to do his bidding.

You can hit escape to exit the app during game play after the initial Title screen.
